titles.title: Defending Educational Opportunities for West Virginia Students Act of 2017
Defending Educational Opportunities for West Virginia Students Act of 2017
A bill to authorize the Secretary of Education to review and score TRIO applications with minor budgeting errors.
Defending Educational Opportunities for West Virginia Students Act of 2017

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions
